title: [6] Great tips to get out of low ELO!
body:
[1] Honestly i would watch streamers and just observe how they play and maybe try to learn a new tip or trick. 
[2] Be positive and try not to push your teammates on tilt or they may end up getting confused or really sad and throw the game.
[3] Dont blame people for your mistakes and think of what you could do to not replicate the same mistake
[4] For lower ELO if there is a certain champion that you are really good at like mastery 5+ you could play or try to play normal games and unlock Champions in meta for a Champion pool. (Just in case of ban)
[5] Try to focus on staying offensive and keep a clear mind or listen to music or try something that calms u down to stay off tilt (salt) 
[6] Try to help your teammates as much as possible and take opportunities when they are given to you Example: The enemy team gets aced and its 20 mins in game you should take baron or dragon. If this tutorial helped you i really love it if u shared with friends and be looking out for another guide.
